item.title: irene add a quote by Blaise Pascal
item.description: "The heart has its reasons which reason knows not." -- Blaise Pascal

item.title: irene add a quote by Willa Cather
item.description: "The heart of another is a dark forest, always, no matter how close it has been to oneâ€™s own." -- Willa Cather

item.title: irene add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "If you believe in peace, act peacefully; if you believe in love, acting lovingly; if you believe every which way, then act every which way, that's perfectly valid - but don't go out trying to sell your beliefs to the system. You end up contradicting what you profess to believe in, and you set a bum example. If you want to change the world, change yourself." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: irene add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "For one human being to love another human being: that is perhaps the most difficult task that has been given to us, the ultimate, the final problem and proof, the work for which all other work is merely preparation." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: irene add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
